Awake fibreoptic intubation

Awake fibreoptic intubation requires anaesthesia of the airway by nerve blocks or ‘spray-as-you-go’ topical anaesthesia.

Spray-as-you-go: Maximum safe dose of lignocaine is 9ml/kg by this route: Woodall BJA 2005.

Lignocaine 10% topical spray delivers 10mg with each spray.
